author: Special Correspondent - Vsp
text:
Quiz contest

The fourth edition of the Murugappa Kovai Quotient Quiz contest will be held for school students on February 6 at the PSG College of Arts and Science. The quiz will be on the history, heritage, and culture of Coimbatore and its surrounding areas. Cash prizes of over Rs 1. lakh are on offer for the winning teams. Trophies will be given to three teams that reach the top positions. Navin Jayakumar will be the quiz master. Last year around 270 teams had participated. Registrations will be open until January 29.
title: TAMIL NADU
